questions.question: What is the purpose of stage directions?

choices.answer: To show that the characters are speaking to each other.
To show HOW the characters are speaking to each other (emotions, tone, etc.

questions.question: What is a central idea in a text?

choices.answer: The author's main point or message to the reader.
The evidence that supports the main claim.

questions.question: Read the passage below and select what is most likely the central idea of the text.

choices.answer: Spiders are insects.
Spiders have many differences with insects.
Arachnids are the same thing as insects.
Spiders have eight legs and two body segments.

questions.question: Which detail from the passage most clearly shows that Ms. Cowart is an optimistic person?

choices.answer: She had a difficult weekend.
She did not have time to scroll through TikTok.
She believed that things would get better.
She was excited about candy.

questions.question: Which literary theme does the passage below illustrate?

choices.answer: The most important thing in life is making money.
Honestly is the best policy.
Greed can lead people to forget what is important and to do bad things.
Never invest money.

questions.question: Which word best describes the narrator's attitude toward Keesha at the beginning of the story?

choices.answer: respectful
kind
sad
angry

questions.question: Which of the following answers describes the best structure for the start of an informative essay about llama fur?

choices.answer: Starts with a paragraph explaining that the writer's cousin has a llama.
Starts with a paragraph listing all mammals.
Starts with a paragraph talking about the qualities of llama fur.
Starts with a paragraph talking about threats to llamas.

questions.question: Which plot detail describes a story's conflict?

choices.answer: Remy the rat watches the old woman's cooking shows.
Remy moves to Paris.
Remi considers whether or not he will help Linguini cook.
Remy lives happily ever after and runs his own rat restaurant.
Ms. Cowart is a teacher at Woodland.
She teaches 7th grade ELA.
Ratatouille the Musical will be the best production Broadway has seen.
Ratatouille has a character named Remy.

questions.question: Which sentence communicates its ideas most clearly?

choices.answer: Aaron has a TikTok account, but he has 1,391 followers.
If Kathryn has 1,804 followers, she has more followers than Aaron.
Some people lack TikTok skills because they may have difficulty making one.
the dictionary definition of a word
the idea/feeling that a word creates in addition to its definition

questions.question: Which of the following words has the most positive connotation?

choices.answer: happy
ecstatic
excited
cheerful

questions.question: What does the line "Into each life some rain must fall,/Some days must be dark and dreary" mean?

choices.answer: We need rain to grow crops.
Dark days are necessary for our growth.
It gets dark in the winter so we can appreciate the light of the summer.

questions.question: Which of the following contains an example of personification?

choices.answer: The owl flew through the forest.
The wind whispered through the tall grass.
The dog slept through the thunderstorm.
The person yelled for their neighbor to come help them hang up lights.
